Package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter

package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter
Package containing classes for common formatter logic.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.eclipse
    Package containing common classes for all kinds of Eclipse formatter.
    de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.exceptions
    Exceptions package for External Code Formatters.
    de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui
    Main UI package for External Code Formatters.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractFormatJob
    Abstract base implementation of a FormatJob which is called by the FormatterService where this implementation belongs to.
    AbstractFormatJob.BreakException
    RuntimeException which is used as a break condition inside a Iterable.forEach(java.util.function.Consumer).
    FormatJob
     
    FormatterService
    Service interface for external formatter implementations.
    FormatterServiceDelegate
    Singleton delegation class for calling the activated external formatter, if no external formatter is activated nothing will be done by this implementation.
    MimeType
    Enum describing the supported mime types for external formatters.
